channel.title: New Round of Game Key/Invite Giveaways and/or Contests
channel.description:
I know a lot of us missed the Alpha days when game keys were being given out but there has been an influx of new players and I really want to help spread the love of this game. Also, what better way to think about doing new giveaways during the holidays coming up?
Do we have anything in the works for new giveaways? I really want to give my friends an opportunity to play but they are procrastinating because of the $9.99 fee (I know its small but people are wanting to spend money on others thing right now like BF2, X-mas Shopping etc etc)
Edit TL:DR: This topic is not mainly asking for handouts, I really want to spread the love on this game and I think with the holidays just around the corner, a new round of Contests and Giveways would be perfect!

item.source: New Round of Game Key/Invite Giveaways and/or Contests

item.title: New Round of Game Key/Invite Giveaways and/or Contests
item.dc:creator: í42-Xblade
item.description:
• Pls don’t beg for keys, then report someone that calls you out for it O_o

  • Rope, money is great, money also helps make a great game better, but we’re not doing it just for the money – although it helps all situations. Many other games only care about the money, while we care about both money AND the game.

  • We’ve given away thousands of keys. We still do, just indirectly (yet everywhere – follow your favorite content creators or #events in Discord). If what we offer for 10 bucks isn’t worth it to you or not worth the time to seek out a key, perhaps this isn’t the game for you, mate. We’ve spent about 10 hours a day for the past 2 years making this game – what it’s worth to you is a personal decision.

Read full topic
item.source: New Round of Game Key/Invite Giveaways and/or Contests

I am almost certain the only way they will give keys if it is to streamers so they will play the game and give it publicity (they might also give extra keys to the streamers to give away for free for more hype around the game)

item.title: New Round of Game Key/Invite Giveaways and/or Contests
item.dc:creator: PandaKing
item.description:
oh I’m not discounting money for the devs; that’s why suggestion #3 would work, buy 1 game key get 1 free and this isn’t about communism or capitalism (I don’t know what country you are from but I am from USA where Capitalism is respected) this is about simple contests or giveaways, why you hating on contests/giveaways, you’re acting like this is a new strategy for most gaming companies, heck even the smallest of indie companies are doing it and I’m just suggesting something to tie in the holiday spirit, slow your roll dude because it’s coming across toxic man. Nothing but love here <3

Read full topic

item.title: New Round of Game Key/Invite Giveaways and/or Contests
item.dc:creator: PandaKing
item.description:
I’m not begging. I was just asking about Contests and/or giveaways for more support of this game. Most games do this to gain more support when they are new and they usually do like contests, giveways, social media contests etc etc, trust me if I had the money to buy everyone a key I would.

So back to the main point of this thread; suggestions below maybe?

  1. The best deathnote contest (Must be manually drawn and not macros) - Receive 2 free game keys
  2. Social Media contest. Like the facebook page = 1 contest entry, tweet the contest = 1 contest entry. 10 random winners will all receive 2 game keys.
  3. ToL double gifts event. If you purchase a game for a friend receive a free game key to give to another friend.

These are just a few suggestions for the Devs.

Read full topic
item.source: New Round of Game Key/Invite Giveaways and/or Contests
